Name: Last Heroes
About the game: Presentation Last Heroes is an RPG developed by Warfare Studios, the team already behind Vagrant Hearts , Ashes of Immortality , Valiant: Resurrection and Midnight's Blessing. Plot Viktor is the new king of Abakam, but powerful forces are moving to destroy him and his kingdom. At the forefront of the resistance is Viktor's own brother, Viper. Viper wants Viktor's crown and he will do anything to get it. To stop his brother, Viktor must embark on a quest. Along the way Viktor will make new friends, experience dreams, and discover his destiny. Best-selling games by Warfare Studios
Meta Title: Last Heroes: Nov 13, 2015, Warfare Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Last Heroes? Check out the release date (Nov 13, 2015), developer insights from Warfare Studios, and a complete game summary.
